name: Android - Lode Runner
description:
I decided to build this game in 2002 because it remembers me the game I played at school when I was a kid. This game by Infogrames was designed for TO7 and MO5. With the help of MarbleMad (Graphic Artist) and redRibbon (Musician) and Patrox (Level designer) we started this project.

Android is a great Lode-Runner remake with 200+ levels and 5 nice themes and a lot of action. Pickup all the golds bags before being caught by levels guards, and find the door. Use bombs to stop ennemies, to pass though bricks. Don't be caught droid, avoid spikes.
